Reading CoE statistics

Source: vignettes/reading-coe-statistics.Rmd
reading-coe-statistics.Rmd
library(coeparishdata)

coe_nomis_codes

coe_stats 

coe_stats(nomis_code =  "TS001", level = "england")
#>   population lives_in_a_household lives_in_a_communal_establishment
#> 1   56506784             55542946                          963837.8
coe_stats(nomis_code = "TS001", level = "diocese", areas = 1)
#>   diocese_name diocese_number population lives_in_a_household
#> 1 Bath & Wells              1     979315             959638.4
#>   lives_in_a_communal_establishment
#> 1                          19676.56

coe_parish_in_context
